body:
New Year 2017 - Giveaway

Hey guys. To start fresh the New Year, I wanted to make a Giveway for all you guys.
So I hope you guys enjoy this Giveway, and happy New Year!
! And don't be mad if you don't win, I will make more giveaways soon. !
---
Gift/s:
Emerald Rank (Permanent)
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Ok, now you have to follow this steps to join into the Giveaway:
-------
• Add me as a friend on Avicus
• Comment: 'I want to start fresh with this Emerald Rank in this account: [NAME]'
(Example: I want to start fresh with this Emerald Rank in this account: AbusiveUser or your friends name)
--------
Little Reminder: You can't participate in the Giveaway if you have a Rank already. (If it is temporal you can participate)
---------------------------------------------------------------------
This Giveaway will finish at 6/01/2017
Good Luck everyone.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Winners:


{tag=6a81760ce56942099de44e6f636ab030}
&
{tag=38cc237d92724e01ad24f5b0110130c1}

Please, congratulate them and don't get mad if you didn't win. I will do more giveaways in the future.!!
(Winners, please contact me in game or TeamSpeak please)
body_tagged:
New Year 2017 - Giveaway

Hey guys. To start fresh the New Year, I wanted to make a Giveway for all you guys.
So I hope you guys enjoy this Giveway, and happy New Year!
! And don't be mad if you don't win, I will make more giveaways soon. !
---
Gift/s:
Emerald Rank (Permanent)
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Ok, now you have to follow this steps to join into the Giveaway:
-------
• Add me as a friend on Avicus
• Comment: 'I want to start fresh with this Emerald Rank in this account: [NAME]'
(Example: I want to start fresh with this Emerald Rank in this account: AbusiveUser or your friends name)
--------
Little Reminder: You can't participate in the Giveaway if you have a Rank already. (If it is temporal you can participate)
---------------------------------------------------------------------
This Giveaway will finish at 6/01/2017
Good Luck everyone.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Winners:


InputIGNHere
&
Acceqted

Please, congratulate them and don't get mad if you didn't win. I will do more giveaways in the future.!!
(Winners, please contact me in game or TeamSpeak please)
title: [GIVEAWAY] New Year - Closed | Winners HERE
